oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of an incident involving Tamme's father in which he asked a party of men for a bow. Tamme says that his father had killed a person and was killed by 'another man'. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tamme's father
